title: Constructing Query-Driven Evidence Graph On-the-Fly for GraphRAG
authors: Manzong Huang, Chenyang Bu, Yi He, Xingrui Zhuo, Xindong Wu
keywords: GraphRAG, GraphRAG, hallucination, knowledge graph, LLM
summary: Relink mitigates hallucinations in LLMs by dynamically building evidence graphs based on queries.
